mapper.select: SELECT PROMOTION_ID, PROMOTION_NAME, PROMOTION_CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') END_DATE, PROMOTION_TYPE, PROMOTION_VALUE, PROMOTION_BANNER_ID, PROMOTION_DETAIL_IMAGE_ID, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(S.STORE_NAME SEPARATOR ',') FROM PROMOTION_STORE PS, STORE S WHERE PROMOTION_ID = PS.PROMOTION_ID AND PS.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID) STORE_ID, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DATE, STATUS FROM PROMOTION

SELECT PROMOTION_ID, PROMOTION_NAME, PROMOTION_CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(END_DATE,'%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') END_DATE, PROMOTION_TYPE, PROMOTION_VALUE, PROMOTION_BANNER_ID, PROMOTION_DETAIL_IMAGE_ID, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(S.STORE_ID SEPARATOR ',') FROM PROMOTION_STORE PS, STORE S WHERE PROMOTION_ID = PS.PROMOTION_ID AND PS.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID) STORE_ID, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE, STATUS FROM PROMOTION
AND PROMOTION_ID = #{promotionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROMOTION ( PROMOTION_ID, PROMOTION_NAME, PROMOTION_CONTENTS, END_DATE, PROMOTION_TYPE, PROMOTION_VALUE, PROMOTION_BANNER_ID, PROMOTION_DETAIL_IMAGE_ID, STATUS, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{promotionId}, #{promotionName}, #{promotionContents}, #{endDate}, #{promotionType}, #{promotionValue}, #{promotionBannerId}, #{promotionDetailImageId}, #{status}, #{regId}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO PROMOTION_STORE ( STORE_ID, PROMOTION_ID, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{storeId}, #{promotionId}, #{regId}, NOW() )
